analysis.description:
AriumCrowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3cd638c5013b70b795dd0a171376b579fc76cbc.sol#277-306) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3cd638c5013b70b795dd0a171376b579fc76cbc.sol#301-302)
	-token.transfer(restricted,restrictedTokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3cd638c5013b70b795dd0a171376b579fc76cbc.sol#306)

AriumCrowdsale.ManualTransfer (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3cd638c5013b70b795dd0a171376b579fc76cbc.sol#306-314) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,rate.div(1000).mul(ammount)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3cd638c5013b70b795dd0a171376b579fc76cbc.sol#311-313)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0xd3cd638c5013b70b795dd0a171376b579fc76cbc.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3cd638c5013b70b795dd0a171376b579fc76cbc.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3cd638c5013b70b795dd0a171376b579fc76cbc.sol#87-92) is not in mixedCase
